LiveRealTimeClip.document: This example shows you how to cut out a video clip from a live stream (live stream code: record-stream; domain name: example.com) from `2018-09-20T10:00:00Z` to `2018-09-20T11:00:00Z` for temporary sharing. The live stream was interrupted for 10 minutes from `2018-09-20T10:30:00Z` to `2018-09-20T10:40:00Z`, so the output parameter `SegmentSet` contains the information of two segments, and the actual duration of the video clip is 50 minutes.

Host: vod.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json

    "EndTime": "2018-09-20T11:00:00Z",
    "StartTime": "2018-09-20T10:00:00Z",
    "StreamId": "record-stream"
}
LiveRealTimeClip.title: Clipping a live video for temporary sharing
